name: get_us_real_gdp
description: This API returns the annual and quarterly Real GDP of the United States.

interval.description: By default, interval=annual. Strings quarterly and annual are accepted.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_real_gdp_per_capita
description: This API returns the quarterly Real GDP per Capita data of the United States.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_treasury_yield
description: This API returns the daily, weekly, and monthly US treasury yield of a given maturity timeline (e.g., 5 year, 30 year, etc).

interval.description: By default, interval=monthly. Strings daily, weekly, and monthly are accepted.

maturity.description: By default, maturity=10year. Strings 3month, 2year, 5year, 7year, 10year, and 30year are accepted. Source: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (US), Market Yield on U.S. Treasury Securities at 3-month, 2-year, 5-year, 7-year, 10-year, and 30-year Constant Maturities, Quoted on an Investment Basis, retrieved from FRED, Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_federal_funds_rate
description: This API returns the daily, weekly, and monthly federal funds rate (interest rate) of the United States.

interval.description: By default, interval=monthly. Strings daily, weekly, and monthly are accepted.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_cpi
description: This API returns the monthly and semiannual consumer price index (CPI) of the United States. CPI is widely regarded as the barometer of inflation levels in the broader economy.

interval.description: By default, interval=monthly. Strings daily, weekly, and monthly are accepted.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_inflation
description: This API returns the annual inflation rates (consumer prices) of the United States.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_retail_sales
description: This API returns the monthly Advance Retail Sales: Retail Trade data of the United States.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_durables
description: This API returns the monthly manufacturers' new orders of durable goods in the United States.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_unemployment
description: This API returns the monthly unemployment data of the United States. The unemployment rate represents the number of unemployed as a percentage of the labor force. Labor force data are restricted to people 16 years of age and older, who currently reside in 1 of the 50 states or the District of Columbia, who do not reside in institutions (e.g., penal and mental facilities, homes for the aged), and who are not on active duty in the Armed Forces (source).

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_us_nonfarm_payroll
description: This API returns the monthly US All Employees: Total Nonfarm (commonly known as Total Nonfarm Payroll), a measure of the number of U.S. workers in the economy that excludes proprietors, private household employees, unpaid volunteers, farm employees, and the unincorporated self-employed.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
